No. 16. No. 648. No. 5,

Misc.

No. 6,

Misc.

No. 635,

Misc.

D’Aria et al. v. United States; Lo Piccolo v. United States; Santore v. United States; Orlando v. United States; and Santore v. United States. Menahem Stim and Allen S. Stim for petitioners in No. 16. Maurice Edelbaum for petitioner in No. 648. Petitioners pro se in Nos. 5, Mise., and 6, Mise. Edward Q. Carr, Jr. for petitioner in No. 635, Mise. Solicitor General Rankin, Assistant Attorney General Wilkey, Beatrice Rosenberg and Kirby W. Patterson for the United States in Nos. 16, 5, Mise., and 6, Mise. Solicitor General Cox, Acting Assistant Attorney General Foley, Beatrice Rosenberg and Kirby W. Patterson for the United States in Nos. 648 and 635, Mise.

C. A. 2d Cir. Certiorari denied.

Reported below: 290 F. 2d 51.
